name: SoothingLies
0:
”Alexa, ask soothing lies to lie to me”
”tell me a soothing lie”
”tell me what I want to hear”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soothing lies
des: Ask "Tell me a soothing lie" or simply "Lie to me", and Soothing Lies will respond with a spurious pleasantry. Turn off your mind and pretend it's true.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
